meanings.sent1: The antiallergenic lotion helped soothe my itchy skin.
meanings.sent2: She always buys antiallergenic bedding to avoid sneezing.
meanings.sent3: The antiallergenic pillow fought off the allergy monster.
meanings.sent4: His antiallergenic superpower shielded him from pollen attacks.
meanings.sent5: The antiallergenic medicine was a lifesaver during allergy season.

meanings.definition: A substance that reduces the likelihood of an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an antiallergenic for her pollen allergy.
meanings.sent2: I always carry antiallergenics in case of an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent3: The antiallergenic was like a shield against allergens.
meanings.sent4: Her bag was full of antiallergenics to stay safe from allergies.
meanings.sent5: The antiallergenic was a must-have for those with sensitivities.
